Package weka.gui

Class Main

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
java.awt.Window
java.awt.Frame
javax.swing.JFrame
weka.gui.Main
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants, OptionHandler
public class Main
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements OptionHandler
Menu-based GUI for Weka, replacement for the GUIChooser. Valid options are: 

 -gui <MDI|SDI>
  Determines the layout of the GUI:
  MDI = MDI Layout
  SDI = SDI Layout
  (default: MDI)
Version:
$Revision$
Author:
fracpete (fracpete at waikato dot ac dot nz)
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • setOptions

      public void setOptions​(java.lang.String[] options) throws java.lang.Exception
      Parses the options for this object.

      Valid options are: 

       -gui <MDI|SDI>
  Determines the layout of the GUI:
  MDI = MDI Layout
  SDI = SDI Layout
  (default: MDI)
      Specified by:
      setOptions in interface OptionHandler
      Parameters:
      options - the options to use
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if setting of options fails
